attributes.action: Consider removing Andrea Leadsom from her cabinet position.
attributes.additional_details:
In this modern democracy it is wrong to have any politican of any position publically declare the belief that all men should be suspected paedophiles. 

Saying, "As an employer.... most of us don’t employ men as nannies... you can call that sexist, I call that cautious and very sensible when you look at the stats. ... We know paedophiles are attracted to working with children. I’m sorry but they’re the facts"

-The Times.

The full story and qoutes were published in the Times on 15/07/2016
attributes.background: After Andrea Leadsoms' disgusting and ignorant comments made in The Times on 15/07/2016, claiming that all men are paedophiles her position in the new government should be revoked.
